name: How To Mine Bitcoin
short-description: A Beginners' Guide To Mine And Invest In Bitcoin
description: If you want to understand all of the factors involved in running a profitable BTC mining operation, this is the book for you. Before you invest your time and money, read this explanation to discover whether mining is rеаllу fоr уоu. In the book, the author concentrates mostly on Bitcoin.
